title: Looking for a FontLab manual
content:
Hello  
I'm new here and this is my first post.  
Looking for a fontlab manual so if anyone can help it would be great.

Thanks
author: Vassilis

comments.content: You can download the PDF manual from fontlab.com gratis.

Or buy the very usefull book Learn FontLab Fast by Leslie Cabarga: [http://www.logofontandlettering.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141113054740/http:/www.logofontandlettering.com/ "http://www.logofontandlettering.com/")
I would definitely buy the Leslie Cabarga book. Very easy to follow step-by-step process. One of the best instructional books I've seen

Vasillis,  
You can aso buy the printed manual from the Print-on-Demand source linked on the FontLab site. The link is not that easy to find. I will look for it tonight when I am at home. I will also post some book titles for you on font design later.

ChrisL

\> You can aso buy the printed manual from the Print-on-Demand  
\> source linked on the FontLab site. The link is not that  
\> easy to find.

Really? On [http://www.fontlab.com/studio/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141113054740/http:/www.fontlab.com/studio/ "http://www.fontlab.com/studio/") , scroll down to the "Buy" section and there is a quite prominent link "Buy printed manuals for our products from OnDemandManuals.com".

A.

Adam,

ChrisL
